meanings.sent1: The overdecoration of the room made it feel cluttered and overwhelming.
meanings.sent2: Her love for overdecoration led to every surface in the house being covered with trinkets and knick-knacks.
meanings.sent3: The overdecoration of the cake with so many candles made it look like a small bonfire.
meanings.sent4: The garden, with its overdecoration of colorful flowers, resembled a vibrant painting come to life.
meanings.sent5: The overdecoration of the classroom with student artwork created a warm and welcoming atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: The overdecoration of the wedding venue with flowers and ribbons was breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: The overdecoration of the Christmas tree with ornaments and lights made it sparkle and shine.
meanings.sent3: The overdecoration of the birthday cake with frosting and sprinkles made it almost too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: The overdecoration of the car with streamers and balloons turned it into a festive party on wheels.
meanings.sent5: The overdecoration of the living room with throw pillows and rugs added a cozy touch to the space.
